name: Chomp
description: A Yelp-like web app for explorers of the world's diverse food scenes. As a Chomper, you can search, browse, view detailed restaurant information, and share your favorite restaurants by liking them. As a Nibbler, you also have the capability of sharing your valuable insights by leaving reviews at restaurants. New swipe-and-match feature to streamline the process of choosing where to dine at with a group in development.

name: Tuiter
description: A replica of the popular social media network, Twitter. Allows users to post and edit 'tuits,' as well as browse and like other users' 'tuits.'

name: Animator
description: An app for creating and playing animations of 2-D shapes based on a text description. Provides four view types: an interactive GUI with additional controls, a standard visual playing, a textual description, and another textual view compliant with the SVG file format. Offers three playing modes: continuous, frame-by-frame, and slow motion.

name: Freecell
description: The classic Freecell Solitaire card game. Supports single-card moves and multi-card moves.

name: Bridgit
description: A clone of Bridget, the strategy and skill game in which two players aim to construct a path connecting opposite sides of the game board while obstructing their opponent from achieving the same.

name: Space Invaders
description: A re-creation of the timeless Space Invaders game.
